list_definition.definition: the part of the head by means of which we hear, or its external part only

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Her new hairstyle covers her ears.

list_definition.definition: the sense or power of hearing especially the ability to hear the difference between sounds

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He has a good ear for music.

list_definition.definition: the part of a cereal plant which contains the seed
